title: CS50: Introduction to Computer Science
description: Harvard's introduction to computer science and programming. Covers algorithms, data structures, web development, and more.

title: Machine Learning Specialization
description: Learn the fundamentals of machine learning from Andrew Ng. Covers supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and best practices.

title: The Complete Web Developer Bootcamp
description: Full-stack web development course covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node, React, MongoDB, and more.

title: Deep Learning Specialization
description: Master deep learning with neural networks, CNNs, RNNs, and more. Taught by AI pioneer Andrew Ng.

title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect
description: Prepare for AWS certification while learning cloud architecture, EC2, S3, RDS, and more AWS services.
